title: Generate Code
description: Generate, review, and debug code across multiple programming languages and frameworks
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: generate
commands.description: Generate code based on a natural language description

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Natural language description of what the code should do

returns.description: Generated code with source, filename suggestion, dependencies list, and usage instructions

commands.name: review
commands.description: Review code for bugs, security issues, and improvement opportunities

returns.description: Review report with severity-rated issues, line-specific comments, suggested fixes, and overall quality score

commands.name: debug
commands.description: Analyze code and error messages to identify and fix bugs

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The source code containing the bug

parameters.name: error_message
parameters.description: The error message or description of unexpected behavior

returns.description: Debug analysis with root cause, explanation, fixed code, and prevention tips
